text: We Got a Love is the second studio album by Irish musician and producer Shit Robot. It was released on 18 March 2014 under DFA Records. ==Critical reception== We Got a Love was met with generally favorable reviews from critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, this release received an average score of 67, based on 11 reviews ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2014 albums Category:DFA Records albums
title: We Got a Love
